title: Near Set Jim Elder Postcards 1069 Different - SOLD
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: Near Set Jim Elder Postcards 1069 Different - SOLD
posts.post_content: Near Set, excellent condition all unused, of Jim Elder Postcards 1069 Different, includes numbers #1 - #1050 (less card #800 Richie Ashburn).  Also includes Jim's price list/checklist, copies of some variations and correspondence from Jack Smalling.  [STRIKE]$750.00[/STRIKE] SOLD postpaid, PayPal Friends and Family or Check/MO,  Thank you.  Jim

If you decide to break up the set or whoever buys the set from you does, I'm interested in four postcards to complete my Orioles set.

  638  Marv Throneberry
  677  Billy Hitchcock 
  681  Paul Richards
1297  Billy Short

Thanks
Alan
